text: Pedostibes (Asian Tree Toads) is a genus of true toads. They live in South India, Malay Peninsula to Borneo and Sumatra. They have horizontal pupils and webbed fingers and toes. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Pedostibes everetti Everett's Asian Tree Toad Pedostibes hosii Boulenger's Asian Tree Toad Pedostibes kempi Kemp's Asian Tree Toad Pedostibes maculatus Spotted Asian Tree Toad Pedostibes rugosus Inger's Asian Tree Toad Pedostibes tuberculosus Warty Asian Tree Toad ==Other websites== * . 2007.
